Welcome to my webpage! Here, you will find samples of my work. I specialize in using **R**, **Python**, and **Adobe Creative Suite**, including **InDesign**, **Photoshop**, and Illustrator, for data visualization, data wrangling, and data analysis. I also have experience with **ArcGIS Pro**, **ArcGIS Online**, and **QGIS** for **geospatial data analysis**, as well as Jupyter and R Markdown for data visualization and geospatial analysis. Also I can use **SQL** in managing relational database. Additionally, I am currently learning Web Development.
